definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
to wear/to put on/to dress/to bore through/to pierce/to perforate/to penetrate/to pass through/to thread

sentences.english: Police in flak jackets are patrolling the districts hit by the violence.
sentences.chinese: 身穿防弹衣的警察正在遭受暴力攻击的地段巡逻。

sentences.english: The boys wore black tail coats in mourning for George III.
sentences.chinese: 男孩身穿黑色燕尾服为乔治三世服丧。

sentences.english: Well armed and equipped Norse swordsmen. Able to wear chain and plate armour.
sentences.chinese: 北欧剑士装备极为精良，身穿链甲或板甲。

sentences.english: John was clothed in camel's hair and wore a leather garment around his waist.
sentences.chinese: 若翰身穿骆驼毛外衣，腰间束著皮带。

sentences.english: The dolls thus arrayed all wear the sumptuous court garb of the Heian period.
sentences.chinese: 所有的玩偶皆身穿平安时代奢华的法官服装。

sentences.english: Our team wore red and white shirts, white shorts and red stockings.
sentences.chinese: 我们队身穿红白上衣，白色短裤和红色长袜。

sentences.english: Protected by lamellar armour, giving these horse archers better protection against enemy attacks.
sentences.chinese: 库尔德弓骑兵身穿鳞甲，能有效抵御敌军攻击。

sentences.english: Leggings under dressed in black like, Lou Zhu can also be a small red heart.
sentences.chinese: 下身穿黑色的打底裤就好，楼主的小红心也可以。

sentences.english: Standing near a newsstand was a woman in a uniform.
sentences.chinese: 在报摊附近站着一个身穿制服的女人。

sentences.english: Dressed in green in the trees leaned over the touch.
sentences.chinese: 俯身触摸身穿绿衣的小树。

sentences.english: She wore a fine, brightly-colored green suit and her appearance reminds people of the spring.
sentences.chinese: 她身穿别致的绿色套装，犹如春天般生气盎然。

sentences.english: Dressed in his doctor's gown he went in to see her.
sentences.chinese: 身穿医生大褂的凯利医生来到病房看她。

sentences.english: He is like wearing a sheep, sheep sheep set sail under the south.
sentences.chinese: 身穿羊装喜乐羊，羊帆起航下南羊。

sentences.english: Then David and the elders, clothed in sackcloth, fell facedown.
sentences.chinese: 大卫和长老都身穿麻衣，面伏于地。

sentences.english: On board each of the Sunseeker boats, a model in a black bikini poses on the deck.
sentences.chinese: 每艘甲板上都有一位身穿黑色比基尼的模特摇弋生姿。

sentences.english: One of the most common tricks pickpockets use is to wear a uniform to gain trust.
sentences.chinese: 骗子们常用的一个骗术之一是身穿制服博取信任。

definition: whole body/from head to toe/single person/a suit of clothes
ceremonial robe/formal attire (dinner suit, evening gown etc)
to decorate/to adorn/to dress up/to disguise oneself
woman's suit/dress worn over a petticoat
